## createRouteModule() function

创建Route模块

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function createRouteModule<TPagenameMap extends PagenameMap, TRouteModuleName extends string>(moduleName: TRouteModuleName, pagenameMap: TPagenameMap, nativeLocationMap?: NativeLocationMap): {
    moduleName: TRouteModuleName;
    initModel: (store: import("@elux/core").UStore<RootState, RootState>) => void | Promise<void>;
    state: import("@elux/core").ModuleState;
    routeParams: import("@elux/core").ModuleState;
    actions: import("@elux/core").PickActions<import("@elux/core").CommonModel>;
    components: {};
    data: keyof TPagenameMap;
};
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  moduleName | TRouteModuleName | 通常约定为<code>route</code> |
|  pagenameMap | TPagenameMap | 定义Page及路由参数，参见 [PagenameMap](./vue-web.pagenamemap.md) |
|  nativeLocationMap | [NativeLocationMap](./vue-web.nativelocationmap.md) | 运行环境<code>原始路由</code>与<code>Elux路由</code>之间的映射与转换 |

<b>Returns:</b>

{ moduleName: TRouteModuleName; initModel: (store: import("@elux/core").[UStore](./vue-web.ustore.md)<!-- -->&lt;[RootState](./vue-web.rootstate.md)<!-- -->, [RootState](./vue-web.rootstate.md)<!-- -->&gt;) =&gt; void \| Promise&lt;void&gt;; state: import("@elux/core").[ModuleState](./vue-web.modulestate.md)<!-- -->; routeParams: import("@elux/core").[ModuleState](./vue-web.modulestate.md)<!-- -->; actions: import("@elux/core").[PickActions](./vue-web.pickactions.md)<!-- -->&lt;import("@elux/core").[CommonModel](./vue-web.commonmodel.md)<!-- -->&gt;; components: {}; data: keyof TPagenameMap; }

## Remarks

Route模块相对于其它`业务模块`<!-- -->来说是一个框架内置的特殊模块，通过本方法创建。
